clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of HuZhen Capsule for Treatment of Patients With Acute Gout
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Trial About the Efficacy and Safety of HuZhen Capsule in Treating Patients With Acute Gout: A 72 Hours, Multi-center, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Placebo Compared Clinical Trial
clinical_study.source: Guang'anmen Hospital of China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multi-center, double-blind, randomized, parallel controlled trial. Patients with acute gout will be enrolled and randomly allocated into 2 groups: HuZhen capsule treatment group and Placebo control group. Randomization codes were established by the biostatistician. Observe will be followed for 3 days (72 hours) after the onset. Change of VAS score from baseline, proportion of improvement with damp-heat retention, change in C-reactive protein (CRP) and erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR) from baseline, change in white blood cell count in whole blood cell analysis from baseline, and the number of adverse events will be monitored and compared between each groups.

detailed_description.textblock: The test group will be given HuZhen capsule 1.6g three times per day,the control group will be given placebo 1.6g three times per day. The invention will last 3 days.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of VAS (visual analog scale) score from baseline to 72 Hours after onset

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of participants with improvement in acute gout at 72 hours post-dose using the criteria for the diagnosis of damp-heat retention
secondary_outcome.description: Refer to the"Guidline for Clinical Study of New Chinese Medicines "

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in C-reactive protein (CRP) from baseline to 72 hours
Change in erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR) from baseline to 72 hours
Change in white blood cell count in whole blood cell analysis from baseline to 72 hours
The number of adverse events related to treatment

arm_group.description: The main elements of HuZhen Capsule include Polygonum cuspidatum, Ligustrum lucidum etc.
Placebo appearance, content color and taste should be consistent with HuZhen Capsule.

intervention.description: Patients should take 4 tablet once and 3 times per day for 3 days.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Score is equal to or larger than 40cm on the 0-100cm VAS pain scale.
2. Acute attack of gout no longer than 2 days.
3. Participant with acute gout is diagnosed as "damp-heat retention" by Traditional Chinese medicine.
4. Age 18-65 years with informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Chronic gouty arthritis.
2. Pseudogout, acute rheumatic fever and suppurative arthritis, traumatic arthritis, erysipelas, meander rheumatism and other arthritis.
3. Anti-inflammatory medication for the treatment of acute gout.
4. Pregnant or breastfeeding women.
5. History of severe allergy, including diclofenac sodium.
6. Serum creatinine is higher than the upper normal limit. ALT or AST is higher than the upper normal limit for two times.
